note: An English teacher passionate about literature & about my students. Working in a GAFE school with 1:1 Chromebooks. NPDL Deep Learning lead. Teaching, learning, Shakespeare, books, politics, singing, cricket, life, NaNoWriMo. Also shakespearenut@mastodon.education. Header image: photo of my classroom wall with the words 'Dare to Dream it, Work to Achieve It' and 'Kia Kaha!' visible. Avatar pic: bitmoji of grey-haired white woman with asymmetric bob and purple streak, wearing purple glasses.
